children.name: slide
children.description: Fires when the user drags the drag handle to a new position.

children.name: change
children.description: Fires when the RangeSlider value changes as a result of selecting a new value with one of the drag handles or the keyboard.

children.name: resize
children.description: Adjusts the RangeSlider layout to match the size of the container.

children.name: value

parameters.name: selectionEnd `Number`
parameters.description: The selection start value of the RangeSlider.

parameters.name: selectionStart `Number`
parameters.description: The selection start value of the RangeSlider.

children.description: The value method gets or sets the start and end values of the **RangeSlider**. Itaccepts an array as parameter, and returns an object array with the start and endselection values.

parameters.name: enable `Boolean`
parameters.description: The argument, which defines whether to enable/disable the **RangeSlider**.

children.name: destroy
children.description: Prepares the **RangeSlider** for safe removal from the DOM.Detaches event handlers and removes data entries in order to avoid memory leaks.

children.name: tooltip.template
children.description: Template of the tooltip.*   **selectionStart** - the current selectionStart.*   **selectionEnd** - the current selectionEnd.

children.name: tooltip.format
children.description: Format string for the text of the tooltip. Note: The applied format will also influence the appearance ofthe **RangeSlider** tick labels.

children.name: tooltip.enabled
children.description: Disables (**false**) or enables (**true**) the tooltip of the **RangeSlider**.

children.name: tickPlacement
children.description: Denotes the location of the tick marks in the **RangeSlider**. The available options are:

children.name: smallStep
children.description: The small step value of the **RangeSlider**. The underlying value will be changed when the enduser (1) clicks on the increase or decrease buttons of the **RangeSlider**, (2) presses thearrow keys (the drag handle must be focused), or (3) drags the drag handle.

children.name: selectionStart
children.description: The selection start value of the **RangeSlider**.

children.name: selectionEnd
children.description: The selection end value of the **RangeSlider**.

children.name: largeStep
children.description: The delta with which the value will change when the user presses the Page Up or Page Down key (the draghandle must be focused). Note: The allied `largeStep` will also set large tick for every large step.
